mapper.sql: id, user_name, pass_word, nick_name, real_name, manager_picture, login_time, manager_state
mapper.insert: insert into t_manager (user_name, pass_word, nick_name, real_name, manager_picture, loginTime, manager_state) values (#{userName}, #{passWord}, #{nickName}, #{realName}, #{managerPicture}, #{loginTime}, #{managerState})
mapper.update: update t_manager set manager_state = #{state} where id = #{id}
update t_manager set login_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from t_manager where user_name = #{userName} and pass_word = #{passWord} limit 1
select from t_manager where login_token = #{token} limit 1
mapper.update: update t_manager set login_token = #{token} where id = #{id}
